About me
Introduction
I am a Junior at NAU studying software engineering. Currently, I am working with the .NET framework and continuing my projects with Godot Game Engine. I have worked in multiple teams utilizing version control systems including Git, and Kanban boards such as Jira, to plan out development. I find myself enjoying seeing visual and tangible changes with my code that emphasize the intersection between engineering, creativity and art.
